casebody.data:
Fabrice M. LEWIS, Appellant,
v.
MISSOURI DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Respondents. WD 81655 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. Filed: December 4, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied January 29, 2019
Application for Transfer Denied June 4, 2019 Fabrice Lewis, Bowling Green, appellate pro se. Andrew J. Crane, Jefferson City for respondent. Before Division One: Lisa White Hardwick, Presiding Judge, Edward R. Ardini, Jr. and Thomas N. Chapman, Judges

ORDER

Per Curiam

Fabrice Lewis appeals the judgment on the pleadings in favor of the Missouri Department of Corrections ("DOC"), which denied his request for additional jail-time credit. Upon review of the briefs and the record, we find no error and affirm the judgment denying declaratory relief. We have provided the parties with a Memorandum explaining the reasons for our decision, because a published opinion would have no precedential value.

AFFIRMED. Rule 84.16(b).
